sqlList.sql: select lf.order_num,lf.content,lf.create_time, case lf.update_time when lf.create_time then '' else to_char(lf.update_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') end as update_time, lf.type,lf.operator, case lf.is_process when '1' then '已处理' else '未处理' end as is_process, '['||lo.hotel_id||']'||lo.hotel_name as HotelName,lo.price_code as PriceCode from T_LM_order_feedback lf left join t_lm_order lo on lo.fog_order_num = lf.order_num where TYPE='1'

select ls.sales_account,le.linktel as OrderAffirmLinkTel,lex.linktel as OrderVerifyLinkTel,lo.* from t_lm_order lo left join t_lm_sales_history ls on ls.hotel_id = lo.hotel_id and ls.status=1 left join t_lm_hotel_ex le on le.hotel_id = lo.hotel_id and le.type='2' left join t_lm_hotel_ex lex on lex.hotel_id = lo.hotel_id and lex.type='3' where fog_order_num=:FOGORDERNUM
update t_lm_order set book_status_other=:BOOKSTATUSOTHER where fog_order_NUM=:ORDERNUM
